name: Two Gether
description:
Navigate through a nightclub full of your different groups of friends who don't know your identity as well as they think.

Originally started for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 we overscoped way too much and took our time to make it like we wanted in a few weeks.


Controls :

Player 1 : zqsd to move and space to interact

Player 2 : arrows to move and enter to interact
